newsitem.title: USA: Gantos April and first quarter sales fall.
newsitem.headline: Gantos April and first quarter sales fall.

text.p: Gantos Inc said Thursday its same store sales for the four-week period ended May 3, 1997 fell 11 percent from the comparable period last year. Total sales also declined 11 percent to $15.9 million.
Net sales for its fiscal first quarter quarter ended May 3, 1997, were $45.5 million, down 10 percent from the same period a year ago. Same store sales also declined 10 percent from last year.
Gantos also said financial results for its fiscal first quarter would be released on May 20, 1997.
Gantos, a specialty retailer of women's wear and accessories, currently operates 115 stores in 23 states.
